clauses.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

case.text: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

clauses.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
clauses.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.

case.text: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

clauses.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
clauses.clause_text:
Fedora often makes chat rooms, forums, mailing lists, message boards, and/or news groups available to its
users.
Please remember that any information that is disclosed in these areas becomes public information.
Exercise caution when deciding to disclose your personal data.

case.text: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

clauses.title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified at least 30 days in advance.
clauses.clause_text:
Changes to this Privacy Statement

Fedora reserves the right to change this policy from time to time. If we do make changes, the revised Privacy Statement will be posted on this site. A notice will be posted on our homepage for 30 days whenever this privacy statement is changed in a material way.

case.text: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, you are notified at least 30 days in advance

clauses.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: The service is open-source
clauses.description: The code of the software is open-source and the users can have access to the source code.

clauses.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the GDPR.
clauses.clause_text:
Your Rights and Choices in the EEA

Where the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (“GDPR”) applies to the processing of your personal data, especially when you access the website from a country in the European Economic Area (“EEA”), you have the following rights, subject to some limitations, against Fedora:

case.text: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: The publishing of personally identifiable information without the owner’s consent is not allowed
clauses.description: Users agree not to publicly post personally identifiable information (name, postal address, contact information…) without the owner’s knowledge or consent
clauses.clause_text: Publishing someone else’s private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission

case.text: The publishing of personally identifiable information without the owner’s consent is not allowed

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text:
However, you must understand that
the use of cookies may be necessary to provide certain services, and choosing to reject cookies will reduce the
performance and functionality of the site.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: This Privacy Statement was last amended on May 25, 2018.

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text:
Repeatedly instigating conflict, and baiting people into arguments

  • Public or private harassment

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text:
Although we value individual ideas and encourage
free expression, Fedora reserves the right to take necessary action to preserve the integrity of these areas,
such as removing any posting that is vulgar or inappropriate.

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text:
Fedora does not knowingly allow children under the age of 13 to become
registered members of our sites.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
for research activities, including the production of statistical reports (such aggregated information is not
used to contact the subjects of the report);

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text: Fedora does not control the information collection of sites that can be reached through links from fedoraproject.org. If you have questions about the data collection procedures of linked sites, please contact those sites directly.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text:
Fedora’s online services automatically capture IP addresses.
We use IP addresses to help diagnose problems with
our servers, to administer our website, and to help ensure the security of your interaction with our services.
Your IP address is used to help identify you and your location, in order to provide you data and content from
our services as quickly as possible.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
